code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ManageEvents(){const[events,setEvents]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{axios.get('https://newslt-mern.azurewebsites.net/api/events').then(response=>{setEvents(response.data);setLoading(false);}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error fetching events:',error);setLoading(false);});},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Manage Events"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/event'),children:"Create New Event"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:events.map(event=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[event.eventName," - ",event.location]},event._id))})]});}export default ManageEvents;
